lender.name: Madonna
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it was for me to start my publications on a shoestring. I admire ambitious people who have the desire and ambition to start their own business. It's a blessing for me to be able to help, even if it's just a little bit, to make their dream come true.

lender.name: Kyger
lender.loan_because: God wants us to help others.

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.loan_because: Starting good business is the backbone fpr a society, and healthy economy.

lender.occupational_info: Freelancer company: we do search engine optimization works, online data entry works. online email collection works. 12 employees are working and we work as a team.

lender.occupational_info:
We at www.Doors2Me.com are now offering New European Cabinet Doors at finest quality, large selection, and at lowest possible price. Our average fabrication time is 14 days or less and can be delivered 7 days days after fabrication. For more information you can visit us at www.Doors2Me.com.
CABINET DOORS KITCHEN DOORS KITCHEN CABINET DOORS

lender.name: Cade
lender.loan_because: I believe that with a little help, anyone can make a dignified living for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I create activities and events and overall help people have more fun in an online virtual world.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I believe that its my Christian duty to give and to help others reach their potential. I think its important to invest in people and their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist, and I sell my custom art online. I specialize in painting, photography, drawing, sewing, knitting, crochet and sculpting. I also own an organic, handmade beauty product company where I advocate "going green" and using what nature has to offer.

lender.name: Alliz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Because poverty is real and because I believe it can be eradicated. Microfinance makes more sense than charity in terms of long-term sustainability. I also loan because I love that I can reach multiple people around the world with the same $25.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that educates voters about the democratic process in the United States. In particular we focus on ballot initiatives, which is a tool that citizens can use to vote on issues that they care about and that matter to their community.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to see what can happen when we share

lender.name: Jesenia, Anthony & Jayda
lender.loan_because: Someone believed in me once, they loaned me money that open the door for me to further my education...and then that open another door to a career for me. I am now fortunate to be successful in my field...Honest people deserve a chance at work, which often can only happen with money. I believe in hard work, I know how good it feel to provide for myself and family...I want others to enjoy this feeling. I love to earn my own money, and It feels so good to be independant...Im a single parent of 2 children and I want them to be proud of me. We are blessed with all we need, and now I can afford with great love to pay it foward. Good Luck!
lender.occupational_info: Im in sales...I work for a wholesaler and I sell mechandise to retailers. I am 1 female sales person among hundreds of men. I have been with the company for 8 years and I have always had to prove im worthy of this position as a woman, I did prove it, and I still do everyday....but now I do it with pure delight. Thanks to God. so now I will pass on my blessing as often as I can...and hopefully Inspire many who can to do the same.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up, not a hand out.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of micro lending. It's exciting to partner with other lenders, to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a Christian since 1966 and believe we must reach out and help others in God's name. This is one way of achieving this.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: The Octoman's
lender.loan_because: We live in Asia, with Malaysia as our base. We are a family of 5 who believe in helping others in a sustainable way...
lender.occupational_info: Maya, Asha and Tejas are all students who enjoy studying and learning about the environment and others. Carol is full time raising the children and brings funk and soul to our day to day. And Michael is a partner at a private equity buyout fund investing across asia.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I know that empowering women is one of the surest ways to bring about change across the world. Micro-loans are one of the best ways to empower women, who can bring about great change in their communities and society.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: some dear friends helped me to become involved.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Loaning money to people in need is an important form of justice.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English, helping students learn how to write and to read literature.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Dont Lend Give The Lord looks favorably on any Christian who gives selflessly to others. Lending money can be complicated. There is always the issue of when and how it gets paid back, what the money is being used for, and the relationship between the borrower and lender. If a friend or loved one is in need of money, why not simply give it to them? This relieves the burden on both of you of worrying about how it will be repaid. And, its a good Christian thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
Did you know that the most powerful person in the world is one who loves God and is wealthy!
It is my desire for that to be my destiny and my manifestation! I'm Looking forward to being a blessing to the world!
So remember; Always....."Delight yourself in the Lord, and He will grant you the desires of your heart." Psalm 37:4
"I am a manager of cash to help propagate the Gospel of Jesus Christ our Lord"

lender.name: Gini
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. Helping those less fortunate. I am grateful for all that I have...
lender.occupational_info: I manage a non-profit foundation which grants money to further massage therapy research, massage therapy community service projects and massage therapy education.

lender.occupational_info: My family has a business doing repairs and selling spare parts for laser machines. I am currently taking time off to go back to school and study engineering.

lender.name: Gifted Hands
lender.occupational_info:
Teachers are Inspired by the Goal and not the Gold Event
Im so inspired by the Goal and not the Gold at increasing the school readiness of young children in single and low-income families. I started my own in-Home daycare and was inspired to start a center locally in the North Charleston, South Carolina area and to spread to other communities and this is why Im asking for your help to fund my Goal Event to provide this service to the community. The Goal Event will raise vital funds for Gifted Hands CDC. Gifted Hands will be a comprehensive child development center that serves children from birth to age 5, after-school and their families. Gifted Hands will increase the school readiness of young children, provide education, early childhood development and computer technology to children in low-income areas, also creating tomorrows workforce, future leaders and inventors.

In this time of my life i begin to drink alkohol. For 5 years ago i beginn to like to gamble poker in internet or live playing in contryes.I haven:t have a regaluar inkom, a job for 12 years.But still i manage to get 23 creditt cards and about 2 million norwagion money in banks and shops.((( .. lender.occupational_info: In my firm i hold lecture about the life-style change.,and give hops when tings are hard in life. lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed! I come from a very poor family too and so many people were willing to donate to help me get started! Kiva is a way to really help out my brothers and sisters in need and actually know where my money is going! Knowing exactly who I am giving money to, allows me also to pray for that person, so that God multiplies the financial aid I am able to give! I am looking forward to donating again!
lender.occupational_info: I am a former Catholic Missionary to a public university. I am married with an infant son. I teach classes on Catholicism and I lead some bible studies. Most importantly, I pray, pray, pray for all those I meet! I also am a writer. I am writing my Master's thesis on Medjugorje, an area in Bosnia where the Blessed Virgin Mary has appeared. God is the center of my life and my career!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of helping others help themselves. I'm so grateful for the opportunity Kiva gives us to make a difference in others lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator.

lender.occupational_info: I study a very small part of the brain. It is involved in sending signals from one place to another within the brain. It is also part of the machinery used to store memories. My hope is that by studying these parts we can find ways to help people with epilepsy, memory, and motor problems.

lender.loan_because: it's something I can do to help change the world

lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with the world. It's an idealistic vision of everyone spreading joy, but it really would be great if we all helped out, wouldn't it?
lender.occupational_info: I monitor and maintain computer networks. When the machines have a problem, they notify the group of people I work with, and we work to fix them to get them running again.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because:
A man goes out on the beach and sees that it is covered with starfish that have washed up in the tide. A little boy is walking along, picking them up and throwing them back into the water.
"What are you doing, son?" the man asks. "You see how many starfish there are? You'll never make a difference."
The boy paused thoughtfully, and picked up another starfish and threw it into the ocean.
"It sure made a difference to that one," he said. -Hawaiian parable

lender.occupational_info: I am currently serving my country and my fellow citizen.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Stuff You Should Know walks with me to and from work each day and now I won't feel guilty!
lender.occupational_info: I prepare financial statements and tax filings for individuals and businesses.

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because: I care. I believe in the power of honest, hard work and I hope to energize our global community. I have been blessed many times over in my life and, instead of paying it back, I am trying to pay it forward.

lender.name: Yumi
lender.loan_because: Even though I may have not visited or lived in the other parts of the world that I'm helping, it seems that I can have an impact and positively affect people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer software company that helps small businesses run more efficiently.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be a small business owner and need money and not be able to get a small loan from a bank because they don't do small loans. I want to be able to help someone who needs a small loan to stay in business and provide for the family.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners who love what they do but don't love sales. I take over the sales and marketing for them so they can do what they enjoy doing and make more money

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I love God and Jesus and am grateful for His Salvation (John 3:16, 17) because I believe we all fall short of His glorious standard (Romans 3:23) and stand condemned without Jesus (Romans 6:23). I believe we are to love God first, love people unconditionally, and that our missions is sharing His Good News (Matthew 22:36-40 and 28:18-20). Pure and genuine religion in the sight of God the Father means caring for the poor in their distress and refusing to let the world corrupt (James 1:27).
lender.occupational_info: To earn money, I solve problems on and with computers. For Christ, I teach and also work on computers once in a while.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better to give then to keep for myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the United States military.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate then myself. I want to bless others

lender.name: Garry Lloyd
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be impoverished, being helpless and having no choices in life. I have been there, and I want to help in a small way to others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am paying forward in recognition of all the people who have helped me, especially my mother, Louise.
lender.occupational_info: I build software to run on computers that helps people run their businesses.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: This looks like a good way to help people
lender.occupational_info: retired in december 2009 but have started working again helping bank's develop their computers

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I realize how blessed I am. I live in a country and age where with an education & hard work, anything is possible. I would like to help make this possible for people who are not as fortunate as I.
lender.occupational_info: By day, I help people quit smoking cigarettes. My passion is makeing handcrafted jewelry by weaving with seed beads, creating lampworked beads, silver art clay, fusing dichroic glass & wire wrapping/wire sculpture.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I was taught to help others who are less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I teach life skills and help 16 to 24 year olds find employment.

lender.name: Filippo Aroffo
lender.loan_because: I do believe microfinance is a powerful instrument to fight against poverty

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. People need to help people. I have much, and owe it to my fellow people.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs that help people make paper & cardboard packaging.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and am also a musician.

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because: To help!

lender.name: Zandra
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometimes and a little bit of luck. I have many agels in my life, if I can be someones angel, i would be very pleased.

lender.name: D.D.
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chaffey GlobeTrotter
lender.loan_because: we believe that a humble small step can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: We are International Marketing (SP2010) students of Chaffey College, California, USA.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: People have helped me, and I want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and wife, I do many of the same things that all mothers do. I cook, clean, care for my kids, and try to keep my family healthy and happy. I have severe rheumatoid arthritis so I do not work outside the home.

lender.name: Tom Malloy
lender.loan_because: "The successful man is the one who had the chance and took it." -Roger Babson
lender.occupational_info: Investments, Adventure & Philanthropy.

lender.name: Dannielle
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I have resources and there are people who have needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital laboratory. I test specimens of blood and urine which help doctors diagnose various sicknesses.

lender.name: Kees en Joke
lender.loan_because: We willen graag andere mensen te helpen

lender.name: Meredith
lender.occupational_info: I own a store that sells knitting and weaving supplies and I teach fiber arts

lender.name: SHHS
lender.loan_because: We learned about Kiva because one of our school goals is Social Awareness that Impels to action.

lender.name: Reva
lender.loan_because: I want to help families across the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to improve their personal situation and community involvement.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: its a wonderful way to get people started on their path to success.........

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it's a pretty darn awesome way to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Officially, I study and learn as much as I can about a particular subject. Unofficially, I have some fun while I do it! With the occasional bouts of stress thrown in.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I'd like to have a positive effect on others.

lender.name: shirley
lender.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and spend my time mentoring children, keeping my grandchildren, singing in 2 choirs and have a charity knitting group at my house once a month.
